refnamediv.refpurpose: Specification of the pulse shaping filter for a waveform

refsynopsisdiv.title: Calling Sequence

listitem.para: Number of taps of the FIR filter (for implementation of RC, SRRC or Gaussian filters)

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: Note that if a gaussian filter is specified, actually what is implemented is the convolution of a gaussian filter with a moving average filter (of length given by the symbol period), or, saying it another way, the gaussian filter is applied to a signal preformated using NRZ.
